alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 22 at 8:36PM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills from 25 to 35 below zero. * WHERE...Southeastern Carbon. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Expect snowpacked road conditions with areas of blowing and drifting snow impacting travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of light snow will decrease overnight with little additional accumulation. Some drifting snow may continue in rural areas and motorists are urged to use caution yet tonight.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.
